More Info:

Joshua Goldman and Jason Shen both studied biology at Stanford University. Josh graduated with a minor in philosophy and will attend medical school in the fall of 2008. Jason graduated with interdisciplinary honors in Ethics in Society and is the executive director of Gumball Capital, a nonprofit. They have published inStanford Scientific, Neuroscience, the Ivy Journal of Ethics and thePrinceton Journal of Bioethics.
